snippet: A National Gang Threat Assessment report published by the F.B.I. in 2011 described Insane Clown Posse fans, known as Juggalos, as a loosely organized "hybrid gang" that is "rapidly expanding into many" United States communities.
abstract: A National Gang Threat Assessment report published by the F.B.I. in 2011 described Insane Clown Posse fans, known as Juggalos, as a loosely organized "hybrid gang" that is "rapidly expanding into many" United States communities.

headline.main: Insane Clown Posse Says It's Investigating F.B.I. Gang Report
headline.print_headline: Insane Clown Posse Disputes F.B.I. Report
